titles.title: Trooper Timothy Mossbruker Memorial Act
To regulate certain 50 caliber sniper weapons in the same manner as machine guns and other firearms.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 10/30/2001--Introduced. Trooper Timothy Mossbruker Memorial Act - Amends Chapter 53 ( Machine Guns, Destructive Devices, and Certain Other Firearms) of the Internal Revenue Code to include in the definition of the term "firearm" (for purposes of the National Firearms Act) a 50 caliber sniper weapon.Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to prohibit the transfer or possession of a 50 caliber sniper weapon.
